SEARCH
Package org.myshelfie.network

Class EventManager

java.lang.Object
org.myshelfie.network.EventManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
ServerEventManager
public class EventManager extends Object
This class is used to manage the Listener and the events. It stores a map that links the eventType to the listeners. When an event is generated, notify(Enum, Object...) will be called passing the event (of one of the specified eventType) and some argument.

      Subscribe a listener to an event.

      eventType - The enum containing all the events this listener will listen to

    • getListener

      Return the first listener of a certain class that matches a function
      Parameters:
      classToListen - The class that is being listened
      func - A function that returns true if the listener is the required one
      Returns:
      the first listener of a certain class that matches a function

    • notify

      public <E extends Enum<E>> void notify(E event, Object... args)
      Notify all the listeners of the event and forward the argument.
      Parameters:
      event - The event that has been emitted
      args - The arguments to forward to the listeners
